ref.mixed-citation: Huayi huamu niaoshou zhenwan kao華夷花木鳥獸珍玩考, by Shen Maoguan 慎懋官 (1581, blockprint edition), reprint in Xuxiu Siku quanshu (hereafter Xuxiu). According to Bencao gangmu shiyi, the Chengfu tonghui 程賦統會 (originally published 1717), by Liu Sishu 劉斯樞 (Qing), just states that 阿勃參 is produced in Fulin. https://ctext.org/library.pl?if=gb&res=3650.
